Hi, I'm Erik Spoelstra, head coach of the Miami Heat and a Filipino American.
Devastation caused by the recent typhoon in the Philippines has been catastrophic,....
...and millions of children have been impacted.
The NBA family is teaming up with UNICEF to bring life-saving clean water, food,...
...medicine and shelter that are urgently needed.
Please text "RELIEF" to 864233 to donate ten dollars or visit unicefusa.org.
